title: Software Developer Intern
description: Join our engineering team as an intern to learn and contribute to building modern web applications. You'll work alongside experienced developers and gain hands-on experience with industry-standard technologies.
minimumQualifications: Currently pursuing a Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or related field
Basic understanding of programming concepts and web development
Familiarity with Python, React, and TypeScript
Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail
Ability to work collaboratively in a team environment
preferredQualifications: Experience with React or other TypeScript frameworks
Basic knowledge of Node.js and backend development
Participation in coding bootcamps or online courses
Interest in learning new technologies and best practices
aboutTheJob: As a Software Developer Intern at iZyane, you'll have the opportunity to learn and grow in a dynamic, fast-paced environment. You'll work alongside experienced engineers and contribute to real projects while gaining valuable industry experience. This internship is designed to provide hands-on learning opportunities and mentorship to help you develop your technical skills and understanding of software development best practices.
responsibilities: Assist in developing and maintaining web applications under supervision
Write clean, well-documented code following team guidelines
Participate in code reviews and learn from feedback
Collaborate with team members on feature development
Learn and apply software development best practices
Attend team meetings and contribute to project discussions
Work on assigned tasks and small features independently
Document your learning and share insights with the team
